questions.question: What is the primary challenge in IoT forensics?
Which of the following IoT devices is commonly analyzed in forensic investigations?
What does IoT forensics primarily focus on?
options: Examining digital evidence from IoT devices
questions.correct_answer: Examining digital evidence from IoT devices

questions.question: Which data is crucial in IoT forensics?
Which of the following IoT protocols might be involved in forensics investigations?
What is the first step in IoT forensic investigation?
Which tool is commonly used in IoT forensics for data analysis?
Why is data preservation crucial in IoT forensics?
options: To ensure legal admissibility of evidence
questions.correct_answer: To ensure legal admissibility of evidence

questions.question: Which of the following IoT devices often has security vulnerabilities that can be exploited?
What is a major obstacle when analyzing data from IoT devices?
Which data storage method is commonly used by IoT devices for evidence collection?
What role does the Internet of Things (IoT) play in modern forensics investigations?
options: Providing digital evidence from connected devices
Reducing the complexity of digital evidence
questions.correct_answer: Providing digital evidence from connected devices

questions.question: What is the purpose of examining the communication protocols used by IoT devices in forensics?
options: To investigate the data's origin and integrity
questions.correct_answer: To investigate the data's origin and integrity

questions.question: Which type of data is commonly collected from IoT devices during a forensic investigation?
Which of the following is a key aspect of IoT forensics?
Which IoT component would be analyzed to gather data about a smart home device?
Which type of IoT devices are most commonly involved in privacy-related forensic cases?
What is one method for retrieving evidence from a smart vehicle during an IoT forensics investigation?
options: Both accessing diagnostics and monitoring traffic
questions.correct_answer: Both accessing diagnostics and monitoring traffic

questions.question: Which of the following is an important step in preserving IoT data during an investigation?
options: Disconnecting the device from the network
Changing device settings to prevent data loss

questions.question: What is one challenge investigators face when collecting data from IoT devices?
options: Lack of compatibility with forensic tools
IoT devices are rarely connected to the internet
questions.correct_answer: Lack of compatibility with forensic tools
